name: Slice Of Life (itch) (FoggyDude)
description:
In this game you can fulfill your existence in by collecting great cake's lost slices.

Made for the "Jame Gam 20" game jam!

The moving platforms can break for unknown to me reasons, so if they are going sideways just press R to reload(your cakes save)

Credits are in the game.

Thanks for visiting this page!!
